channel.title: PLEASE HELP! (Need help adding item to go into right slot)
channel.description: I really would appreciate some help if someone could please tell me how to fix this problem... Its about when you put an item on it goes straight into the weapon slot... How do I make it to where in this case void knight top goes into plate slot when wearing and so void knight robe goes into platelegs or robe slot? please explain to me how I can fix please Thanks! ;D

item.title: PLEASE HELP! (Need help adding item to go into right slot)
item.dc:creator: @Cry_0f_Death Cry 0f Death
item.description:
@Cry_0f_Death wrote:

Retard ,he might not be using the same source as u. use ctrl+f in your i'm assuming item.cfg, and search for the item you are looking for.

Forgive me if I am mistaken but doesn’t an items Id relate to the client and not the source as in server? If so and an items id changes with the different sources I’d like to know where they are changed. I’m probably just missing something simple though :o

Read full topic

item.source: PLEASE HELP! (Need help adding item to go into right slot)

item.title: PLEASE HELP! (Need help adding item to go into right slot)
item.dc:creator: @Cry_0f_Death Cry 0f Death
item.description:
@Cry_0f_Death wrote:

Try going into your Item4 then look for

public static int body[] =

Add your Void Knight Top into that (Id is 13591)
Now do the same for the robe legs but instead look for

public static int legs[] =

Once again, stick the Void legs in there (Id is 13592).
Save, compile, run, and you should be good to go!

Read full topic
